group_1.textRight: Man... heat waves like this are brutal.
And the weather forecast says this year will be@even hotter than usual.

group_1.textLeft: Seriously? That's the last thing I wanted to hear...
...You know, times like these call for a treat!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Flowing noodles are perfect for hot days!

group_1.textLeft: No, dummy! I was talking about ice cream!

group_1.textRight: You and your sweet tooth, Rena.
Now that you mention it...there's an ice cream@shop that's been getting a lot of attention lately.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, that joint venture with an ice cream@maker in Sakae, right?
Word of mouth says it's really good.

group_1.textRight: Huh, where'd you hear about that?

group_1.textLeft: I read about it on Tomo-C.

group_1.textRight: Tomo-C...?
Oh, I see, it's a student social networking app,@"Tomodachi Circle."

group_1.textLeft: Yep, and apparently, that shop is collaborating@with Tomo-C to host a special contest right now.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah? What kinda contest?

group_1.textLeft: It's a movie contest. [chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100901:motion_400][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]Here, check this out!

group_1.narration: "Here's your summer project!@Make a short movie about summer@and post it on Tomo-C!"
"Submit your results through our app@and win phenomenal prizes!"
"The only must-haves are that the movie features@six students and a summer-related theme."
"It's that simple!@And if your submission gets a high rating,@you might win a special prize of your choice..."
"Capture the spirit of summer,@win everyone's votes,@and score the perfect prize!"

group_1.textRight: A prize of your choice... Wow! There's tons to@choose from!
A year's supply of ice cream... A high-end camera...@A commemorative hoodie and towel...
...Hm? What's this thing? A stuffed "sweaty@bunny" plushie?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's the ice cream maker's mascot.

group_1.textRight: It's kinda cute...

group_1.textLeft: ...Momoko, you want that doll, don't you?

group_1.textRight: I didn't say that!
Well, I mean...I did say it was cute, but...
*Giggle*
You like cute plushies, don't you, Momoko?

group_1.textLeft: If we put up a movie on Tomo-C, we can get it@as a prize.
You wanna try it?

group_1.textRight: Nah...I'd rather not...
I just don't like the idea of puttin' a video of@myself online...

group_1.textLeft: What are you so shy about?

group_1.textRight: It's not that, exactly.
It’s dangerous to post your face online, you know.@Ya never know who might see it.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh... You have a point.
But still, this app makes a big fuss about how it’s@for Japanese students only,
and how it’s got all these state-of-the-art security@measures, so I think we’ll be fine!
...Yeah!
We can get you that prize you want, Momoko!

group_1.textRight: Look... I was just tryin' to say that the plushie@looked... nice, that's all.
Seriously, please don't sweat it.

group_1.textLeft: Well, Kaede and I are gonna do the contest for@fun, anyway,
So we're gonna win that prize for you, Momoko!
Yeah, that's right!

group_1.textRight: You guys...
Oh, but wait... this says the movie has to have@six people in it.
We need to get more people to join us.

group_1.textLeft: I guess so...
And we also need to figure out what kind of@movie will get the highest rating.
So let's do some research!

group_1.textRight: Okay!

group_1.textLeft: We're gonna nab that plushie you want, Momoko!@That’s a promise!

group_1.textRight: Ah, sure...
